pages.text: $(9)Armor Toughness$() is a stat that adjusts how effective your armor is against higher damaging attacks.$(p)Usually provided by armor, and some shields.
$(9)$(n)Base Value:$() 0$(p)$(9)$(n)Max Value:$() 30$(p)Note: In vanilla, the max value is 20.  Apotheosis raises the cap to 30, and also changes armor math.
